mapper.select: select * from typing_history where user_id=#{userId} and mobile=#{mobile} and match_type=1 and type_date=#{typeDate} limit 1
select u.username,h.* from typing_history as h join base_account as u on u.id=h.user_id where mobile = 0 and match_type = 1 and typeDate = #{typeDate} order by speed DESC
